anya-e0105n11:1_0: Ayaṁ pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāsanamalabhūtānaṁ adhammavādānaṁ uppatti.
anya-e0105n11:1_1: Asokarañño hi kāle uppabbājetvā nikkaḍḍhitā aññatitthiyā buddhasāsane aladdhapatiṭṭhā kodhābhibhūtā pāṭaliputtato nikkhamitvā rājagahasamīpe nālandāyaṁ sannipatitvā evaṁ sammantayiṁsu ‘‘mahājanassa buddhasāsane anavagāhatthāya sakyānaṁ dhammavinayo nāsetabbo,
anya-e0105n11:1_2: tañca kho tesaṁ samayaṁ ajānantehi na sakkā kātuṁ,
anya-e0105n11:1_3: tasmā yena kenaci upāyena punapi tattha pabbajitabbamevā’’ti.
anya-e0105n11:1_4: Te evaṁ sammantayitvā puna āgantvā visuddhattheravādīnamantaraṁ pavisituṁ asakkontā tadaññesaṁ sattarasannaṁ mahāsaṅghikādinikāyānaṁ santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā attano aññatitthiyabhāvaṁ ajānāpetvā pabbajitvā piṭakattayamuggaṇhitvā tañca viparivattetvā tato kosambiṁ gantvā dhammavinayanāsanāya upāyaṁ mantayitvā 253-buddhavasse chasu ṭhānesu vasantā (1) hemavatiko (2) rājagiriko (3) siddhatthiko (4) pubbaseliyo (5) aparaseliyo (6) vājiriyo (7) vetullo (8) andhako (9) aññamahāsaṅghikoti nava abhinave nikāye uppādesuṁ nikāyasaṅgahe 9-piṭṭhe.
anya-e0105n11:1_5: Tesaṁ nāmāni ca laddhiyo ca kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ āgatāyeva.
anya-e0105n11:8_0: Vajirapabbatavāsino vājiriyā (6) gūḷhavinayaṁ nāma ganthaṁ akaṁsu.
anya-e0105n11:9_0: Teyeva sabbe māyājālatanta-samājatantādike aneke tantaganthe ca,
anya-e0105n11:13_2: aññāni pana vaṇṇapiṭakādīni jambudīpeyeva nivattantīti nikāyasaṅgahe vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n11:14_0: ‘‘Vaṇṇapiṭaka aṅgulimālapiṭakaraṭṭhapālagajjitaāḷavakagajjitagūḷhamaggagūḷhavessantara gūḷhavinaya vedallapiṭakāni ettha ‘‘vepulla, vedallaṁ, vetullanti atthako ekaṁ,
anya-e0105n11:14_2: tathā hi vuttaṁ asaṅgena nāma ācariyena abhidhammasamuccaye nāma mahāyānikagante (79-piṭṭhe) ‘‘vepullaṁ katamaṁ?
anya-e0105n11:14_3: bodhisattapiṭakasampayuttaṁ bhāsitaṁ. yaduccate vepullaṁ, taṁ vedallamapyuccate, vetullamapyuccate. kimatthaṁ vepullamuccate?
anya-e0105n11:14_5: udāragambhīradhammadesanāto ca. kimatthamuccate vedallaṁ? sabbāvaraṇavidalanato. kimatthamuccate vetullaṁ?
anya-e0105n11:14_6: upamānadhammānaṁ tulanābhāvato’’ti pana abuddhavacanāniyevāti vutta’’nti ca.
anya-e0105n11:16_0: ‘‘Gūḷhavinayaṁ gūḷhavessantaraṁ gūḷhamahosadhaṁ vaṇṇapiṭakaṁ aṅgulimālapiṭakaṁ raṭṭhapālagajjitaṁ āḷavakagajjitaṁ vedallapiṭakanti abuddhavacanaṁ saddhammapatirūpakaṁ nāmā’’ti ca–
anya-e0105n11:17_0: Tesaṁ paṭikkhepo dissati. Na hi tāni asutvā,
anya-e0105n11:17_1: tesañca atthaṁ ajānitvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyehi tāni paṭikkhipituṁ sakkā,
anya-e0105n11:17_2: nāpi taṁ paṭikkhepavacanaṁ jambudīpikaṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ vacanaṁ bhavituṁ,
anya-e0105n11:17_4: Tasmā tāni ca tadaññāni ca mahāyānikapiṭakāni taṁkālikāni yebhuyyena sīhaḷadīpamupāgatānīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0105n11:17_5: Tesu ca vajjiputtakagaṇapariyāpannassa dhammarucinikāyassa piṭakānaṁ tadupāgamanaṁ pubbeva vuttaṁ.
